Summary: Murrysville: Nightly sightings of multiple crafts of different types filmed in HD
divs: sighting detailsmurrysville, pennsylvania ongoing repeated sightings originating from a patch of woods area as viewed and filmed from both sides. video showing locations in daytime can be viewed here on my youtube.com channel: seeingufospa http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=czkjlf7haly -------------------------------------------------------------------- multiple types seen on now nightly basis: white, red, orange orbs--sometimes flashing or pulsing. travel freely through tall thick patches of woods and filmed doing so. red round one mimics tower beacon, but moving through trees gives it away. orange ones seen in plasma type form and more solid metallic surface. white ones seen flashing brightly and traveling through sky with flame-like effect which later morph into fake helicopter on film (september 17th). dozens of them seen almost every night we look. they transform into aircraft looking crafts, complete with flashing lights of different colors, usually start off as bright golden orbs low in sky, which hover for a while before transforming. series of videos regarding such can be partly seen here: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=hib4hjknhya (part 1) _______________________________________________ transformer ufos now being seen along with others - 3 times in 4 days. they first appear moving freely amongst the high trees as white or orange orbs, then rise up above them and transform into what appears to be our aircraft--but they're not. september 20, 2009 (pictures with report) - 10:36 pm (farm field) - video here: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=ah2xubypwse september 22, 2009 - 9:27 pm (blackthorn pro shop) - video here: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=5v9swilc3zm september 23, 2009 - 8:45 pm (farm field) - video here: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=s4qpdxpgp30 if you only have time to see one video - it is imperative you see this september 23, 2009 video to believe me!. it transforms into jet plane and you can actually see it spit out a wing which unfolds. the scary part is they are not only imitating our aircraft looks, but now convincing engine sounds. presumably so they can fit in, fly unnoticed all around us, without being bothered or shot at. smart enough to get here - smart enough to fake us out. if no one comes here to witness it themselves, they are missing out on the biggest phenomenon in our recent history. i've provided the locations, shown what they look like, and can spot them... yet no one has even come to see it with us--yet! (although a few with guts have expressed the desire too & am trying to coordinate a group effort to witness & film them from multiple locations surrounding the area). we need hi-tech gen3 nightvision zoom lenses (like astrovision) on pro camcorders (like sony's new line with exemor chips) and\or spotlights to get better footage--plus radiation detection and other scientific measuring devices while the activity is going on. remote battery operated motion sensing equipment too. i can think of more if you give me time. i've never seen one actually sitting on the ground and exploration of the overgrown fields & woods with hedge clippers produced no signs of disturbance nor landing. the "taos hum" low-frequency sound is heard around my house & pro shop at an annoying level for several years--no direction can be determined & not heard by everyone. photographs of valley on flash reveal multiple orbs and white small "tail" shaped lights frequently also. faint small orbs recorded on nightshot video around us sometimes. i can see the faint orange orbs drop from the sky occasionally after dusk... my 'military grade' surveillance cam had recorded them before in b\w and i couldn't understand how what i assumed was 'space debris' could be so big as to disappear beyond the treeline which is 500 feet away. now i know. sounds too incredible, doesn't it? is no one coming out here because they're afraid? or is it because i copyright all my work so the ones who charge for this kind of knowledge instead of sharing it for free like me have to pay? i have shared the footage with all the major tv stations and no one has even acknowledged it. it seems the time is ripe for the public to demand answers from the powers that be.
